course

Interface Course

  • All Superinterfaces:
    CourseAccessor, CourseModifier, GraderObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCourse, AbstractCourseSnapshot

    public interface Course
extends CourseAccessor, CourseModifier
    Holds all the methods associated with a course.
